Producer: Lucas Joaquin, Ira Sachs, Christos V. Konstantakopoulos, Jim Lande, L.A. Teodosio
Production Co: Water's End, Buffalo 8, Raptor Films, Parts & Labor, RT Features
Synopsis: Two teens develop a growing friendship in Brooklyn, N.Y., while the feud between their respective parents (Greg Kinnear, Jennifer Ehle) continues to escalate.
Title: Little Men
